resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · Change: Added closeout message for systems running on Android < 5.0
 · Change: Unified Google Maps rotation settings into menu entry "Map rotation"
 · Change: Allow max zoom on combined OpenStreetMap offline map
 · Change: Coordinate editor - Validation deferred to save coordinates
 · Change: Updated several links to https
 · New: Show info on completion of "add current location"
 · New: Add option to clear the goto history
 · New: Support other OSM based online map sources
 · New: Add support for multilingual OSM maps
 · New: Implemented Filtering by Country
 · New: Copy waypoints between caches
 · New: Sort "goto history" waypoints by newest on top
 · New: Add waypoint from single cache map added for Google Maps
 · New: Allow starting WhereYouGo from cache detail's main page
 · New: Open images from cache detail page in separate task
 · New: Show waypoint user note in waypoint popup
 · Fix: Crash on moving data to SD card
 · Fix: A couple of minor issues
 · Fix: Cache gallery tab empty after editing personal note
 · Fix: Crashes under special circumstances on map
 · Fix: Individual route did not consider change of routing type
 · Fix: Individual route lost after resuming map
 · Fix: Show new waypoint in waypoint tab directly after creating it on map
 · Fix: Updated useful apps icons for send2cgeo and cgeo contacts
